title: Agent Hub PTY Manager -- terminal I/O multiplexing for agent containers

comment: Pre-review COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title present: "Agent Hub PTY Manager -- terminal I/O multiplexing for agent containers". (2) Frontmatter revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- appropriate for v0.1. (3) All 12 CR sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present and complete. (4) No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) in pre-approved sections 1-9; execution-phase template markers in sections 10-11 are appropriate at this stage. (5) Traceability: references CR-060, CR-064, SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005. Parent document correctly listed as None (genesis work). (6) No typos or errors found. (7) Formatting consistent throughout. (8) Technical content is thorough: clear problem statement (stale last_activity, no terminal access), well-documented approach (Docker SDK exec socket, PTYSession/PTYManager classes, callback interface), justified design decisions (persistent socket vs polling), and comprehensive testing plan covering full lifecycle. No technical units required -- Agent Hub is genesis infrastructure not yet under SDLC governance.

Post-review COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title: "Agent Hub PTY Manager -- terminal I/O multiplexing for agent containers" -- present and correct. (2) Frontmatter revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- acceptable for executable document (self-authorizing per SOP-002 Section 8). (3) All 12 CR sections per SOP-002 Section 6 present and complete. (4) No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) found. (5) Execution table: all 8 EIs show Task Outcome = Pass with signed evidence. EI-1 through EI-4 cover original implementation, EI-5 covers 10-test UAT, EI-6 and EI-7 resolve findings F-001 (rate-based activity filter) and F-002 (container_id discovery), EI-8 records Lead manual CLI attach verification. (6) No Fail outcomes; no VARs required. (7) Post-review prerequisites per SOP-002 Section 7.3 and SOP-004 Section 10 all satisfied: execution complete, no blocking VARs, no controlled documents modified, evidence documented, SDLC not applicable (genesis work). (8) Execution Summary provides comprehensive narrative covering all 8 EIs, findings discovered and resolved, and final test results. (9) References valid: SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, CR-060, CR-064. (10) No typos or errors found. (11) Formatting consistent throughout. No technical units required -- Agent Hub is genesis infrastructure not under SDLC governance.
